simpledc.title: Memory, Persons and Dementia
simpledc.creator: Holton, Richard
simpledc.subject: dementia
memory
personhood
simpledc.description: This is the author accepted manuscript. The final version is available from SAGE Publications via http://dx.doi.org/10.1177/0953946816642968
Memory is a complex phenomenon, so the loss of memory that occurs in dementia is equally complex. Accounts that deny personhood to dementia sufferers typically fail to accommodate that complexity.
